quotes.quote: Have you ever thought what it's like to be wanderers in the Fourth Dimension? Have you? To be exiles?
Fear makes companions of us all.
As we learn about each other, so we learn about ourselves.
So you're my replacements. Humph. A dandy and a clown.
Slower! SLOWER! Concentrate on one thing! ONE thing!
quotes.episode: The Power of the Daleks (Season 4, Episode 3)

quotes.quote: Life depends on change, and renewal.
quotes.episode: The Power of the Daleks (Season 4, Episode 3)

quotes.quote: People spend all their time making nice things and then other people come along and break them.
quotes.episode: The Enemy of the World (Season 5, Episode 4)

quotes.quote: We're nowhere. It's as simple as that.
